description: Deliveries Package Tracker allows you to input tracking codes or link your delivery service account information (such as your eBay, UPS, or Amazon account) to track in-transit packages. It stores package, delivery, and account information in databases. Optionally, you can choose to back up these databases at any time, by selecting Backup & restore .

Backing up your Deliveries Package Tracker data creates one or more ORRS files that are stored in a ZIP archive. You can use these files to restore your Deliveries Package Tracker data or transfer it across devices.
